Package com.facebook.buck.core.rules.actions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    An Action that forms the Action graph.
    ActionAnalysisData
    The action related information generated from the rule analysis phase, such as a deferred.
    ActionAnalysisData.ID
    The ID used to identify this action.
    ActionAnalysisDataKey
    The key used to look up the corresponding ActionAnalysisData.
    ActionAnalysisDataLookUp
    Interface for querying for ActionAnalysisData via their unique ActionAnalysisData.ID.
    ActionAnalysisDataRegistry
    An interface for which rule analysis can register their ActionAnalysisData
    ActionExecutionResult
    Represents the result of executing the Action
    ActionExecutionResult.ActionExecutionFailure
    execution that failed
    ActionExecutionResult.ActionExecutionSuccess
    A successful action execution
    Artifact
    An Artifact is a file used during the build stage.
    Artifact.BuildArtifact
    An artifact generated from build
    Artifact.SourceArtifact
    An artifact representing a source file
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAction  
    ActionExecutionContext
    Holds the information Actions can use for its Action.execute(ActionExecutionContext)
    ActionWrapperData
    Implementation of ActionAnalysisData that just holds an Action.
    ActionWrapperDataFactory
    The factory for creating ActionWrapperData.
    ActionWrapperDataFactory.DeclaredArtifact
    The ActionWrapperDataFactory.DeclaredArtifact is the promise during the rule implementation that an Action will be created to generate an output at the corresponding path.
    ImmutableActionAnalysisDataKey
    Immutable implementation of ActionAnalysisDataKey.
    ImmutableActionExecutionContext
    Immutable implementation of ActionExecutionContext.
    ImmutableActionExecutionFailure
    Immutable implementation of ActionExecutionResult.ActionExecutionFailure.
    ImmutableActionExecutionSuccess
    Immutable implementation of ActionExecutionResult.ActionExecutionSuccess.
    ImmutableSourceArtifact
    Immutable implementation of Artifact.SourceArtifact.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ActionCreationException
    Represents an error during action creation
